Web Saturation Hits 1 Billion

20 Jan 2000

inktomi corp. did a crawl of the Web and says there are now over 1 billion pages online. They have some fun facts, like the most common filename (apart from the likes of index.html*), amount of links pointing to pokemon and so on.

Also, Apache Web server stands alone on top with a 60% market share.

Here is inktomi's webmap.

*contact.html
